alert.note: Alert for Inland Brunswick (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 6:18PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Brunswick County through 645 PM EDT... At 617 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brunswick County Community College Main Campus, or 9 miles north of Ocean Crest Pier, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Boiling Spring Lakes, Mill Creek, Brunswick County Community College Main Campus, Supply, Bolivia and Brunswick Novant Medical Center. This includes US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 23 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
